summary: Toggle the OS Window size(s) of GVIM
name: Toggle-Window-Size
description: This will maximize/restore the height and width of the OS Window containing GVIM.  It allows you to specify what the maximum sizes are and will restore the original size and position.
install_details:
just source it in your .vimrc or .gvimrc as:
source tws.vim
